alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, south central Lexington, northeastern Aiken and northwestern Orangeburg Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Aiken State Park to near Barnwell. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cayce, Barnwell, Springdale, Red Bank, Williston, Blackville, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Columbia Metro Airport, Barnwell State Park, Aiken State Park, Swansea, Wagener, North, Pelion, Springfield, Salley, Neeses and Norway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg
